name: What Keeps The Fire Alive
description:
What Keeps The Fire Alive is a story based experience based in the frozen post apocalyptic landscape of Australia.

Follow a parent and their child as they seek shelter in a post global cooling Australia. Relive their story as the parent teaches the child to fend for themselves and live on their own.

Credits:
Programming - Caleb Otto, Coby Jennings, Dillon Curry
Art & Animations - Chris Casmenco
Design - Bryn Jenkins, Ava Kim
Music & Audio - Alice Headlam, Justin Dando
